services.description: our specialists create geometrically correct and even surface, mostly without frills and additional accessories. the main task is not clutter up the room . the furniture set is limited to the ost functional and necessary sets

We cooperate with leading construction companies and suppliers. We provide a service for the full implementationof a turnkey design project of any complexity. For Our Customers , we have favorable conditions from partners in the supply of materials and repair work

We develop projects of any compexity. Only high-quality materials with service life and wear resistance are used in the manufacture. The main featureismobility, so seamless inflatable furniture is very common, which is quitesimply transformed and move.
